front.title: •Sergeant Major Bursk
front.gametext: When in a battle on Hoth, immune to attrition < 3 and adds 2 to attrition against opponent. Your snowtroopers are deploy -1 to same Hoth site. Power -1 when not on Hoth.
front.lore: Leader of most brutal snowtrooper plotoon in the battle of Hoth. Cunning planner. Coordinates attacks and manages troop movements.
